DataElement.preferredName: Diffusion MRI Mean Apparent Diffusion Coefficient
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value to represent a diffusion coefficient to differentiate T2-shine-through effects or artifacts from real ischemic lesions. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diffusion MRI Mean Diffusion Diffusion Coefficient
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: MRI method that measure the diffusion of water in the tissue, rather than the content of water as measured in conventional MRI._The sum of a set of values divided by the number of values in the set._MRI method that measure the diffusion of water in the tissue, rather than the content of water as measured in conventional MRI._A unit of factor of proportionality representing the amount of substance diffusing across a unit area through a unit concentration gradient in unit time.
